before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"31cev","text":"Make sure you work in a DNA-free environment. Preferably in a PCR preparation hood. This is to avoid contamination of your stock and working primer solutions.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":158}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"94j1q","text":"\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65edp","text":"Use PCR-grade water (DNase- and RNase-free) to reconstitute and dilute your primers.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":84}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5v8fv","text":"\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eo17r","text":"Use filter pipette tips to prevent contamination via pipetting.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":63}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9lhp0","text":"Stock primers should not be directly used in a PCR because they are concentrated. Working from one tube is a bad idea, and thus it only takes a small amount of contamination to render your primers ineffective. For this reason, it is best practice to create working solutions that are of lower concentrations. The concentration of choice for a working primer solution is user-dependent. However, 10uM is used for this protocol.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f4btu","text":"Decontaminate a PCR hood with DNA Away and Ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7tu66","text":"Place materials inside of the PCR Hood (refer to materials section).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d6ufs","text":"Turn on the UV setting for at least  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"654oo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"D3CD5AA0E38C11EC892FD376883D3F72","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1fb2n","text":"Temporary seal 6 96-well skirted plates and label each “Reverse Primer Plate ___ Initials/ Date.”","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"but7","text":"Add   of molecular grade water (poured into a 50 mL conical) to each well with a 200uL single-channel pipette. Make sure to get a new tip for each subsequent well (this techelps prevent contamination).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3mn91","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"90","error":false,"guid":"E0D49EC0E38C11EC892FD376883D3F72","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4nck8","text":"After completing 3 primer plates, retrieve the   stock from the freezer and let it thaw.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6lht7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"FF87F6F0E38C11EC892FD376883D3F72","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3vkdl","text":"Temporary seal each primer plate after loading with molecular grade water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bhh4t","text":"Once the EMP   stock has thawed, spin each plate down for   at full speed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e32if","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"56A74760E38D11EC892FD376883D3F72","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"44F60330E38D11EC892FD376883D3F72","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fckis","text":"Add   from each well from the EMP   primer plate using a 10uL multichannel pipette, and pipetting to corresponding well(s) on the   primer plate loaded with water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":34,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":130,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ej14s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4t75","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1bgnk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4bo3u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"5CF88ED0E38D11EC892FD376883D3F72","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"5F419470E38D11EC892FD376883D3F72","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"79B60A70E38D11EC892FD376883D3F72","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"3":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":6,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"9b4ou","text":"Note: Use temporary seals when necessary to help reduce contamination.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"adrkd","text":"Once the   primer plate stock has been made, seal with a foil freezer seal and store in the   freezer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":92,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"43gjs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"ACB17E50E38D11EC892FD376883D3F72","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"AA06F7C0E38D11EC892FD376883D3F72","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}
